greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n, k) = [x^k](p(x, n, q)) where p(x,n,q) = Product_{j=1..n} (x + q^j) + Product_{j=1..n} (x*q^j + 1), p(x, 0, q) = 1, and q = 3, read by rows.
link: G. C. Greubel, Rows n = 0..25 of the triangle, flattened
formula: T(n, k) = [x^k](p(x, n, q)) where p(x,n,q) = Product_{j=1..n} (x + q^j) + Product_{j=1..n} (x*q^j + 1), p(x, 0, q) = 1, and q = 3.
mathematica: p[x_, n_, q_]:= If[n==0, 1, Product[x+q^j, {j,n}] + Product[x*q^j +1, {j,n}]];
Table[T[n, k, 3], {n,0,10}, {k,0,n}]//Flatten (* modified by _G. C. Greubel_, Apr 26 2021 *)
program: p:= func< x,n,q | n eq 0 select 1 else (&*[x+q^j: j in [1..n]]) + (&*[1+q^j*x: j in [1..n]]) >;
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_, Feb 08 2010
